column1: Friends may call Sunday from 4-6pm at The Joseph Rossi and Sons Funeral Home in Niles. A mass of Christian Burial will be held at 10:00am Monday at St. Dominicï¿½s Catholic Church in Youngstown preceded by a 9:00am prayer service at the funeral home. Burial will be in Pineview Cemetery where Domenic will  be honored for his military service by The Trumbull County American Legion Honor Guard.
